entry.title: My First Post and a rant about how much i hate the modern web

link.title: My First Post and a rant about how much i hate the modern web

entry.summary:
I honestly prefer when I was making an entire website in Godot but like someone once said; I’m using a broadsword to spread butter with that technique. I’ll keep trying to make this new website work by publishing blogs and stuff, maybe even make this a public diary. Who knows? Maybe with time i’ll come to like this and switch over to this new system that I’ve always disliked.
I never liked ho...
